test_cases.title: Access Registration Page from Homepage
test_cases.description: Verify that a new user can access the registration page from the homepage.
test_steps: Click on the 'Register' or 'Sign Up' button/link.
test_cases.expected_results: Registration page is displayed.

test_cases.title: Successful User Registration
test_cases.description: Verify that a new user can register with valid details.
preconditions: User is on the registration page
test_steps: Enter valid name, email, and password.
test_cases.expected_results: User is registered successfully and receives a confirmation email.

test_cases.title: Register with Already Used Email
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when using an already registered email address.
preconditions: User is on the registration page
test_steps: Enter valid name, already registered email, and password.
test_cases.expected_results: Error message is displayed indicating the email is already in use.

test_cases.title: Registration with Invalid Input
test_cases.description: Verify that error messages are displayed for invalid registration input.
preconditions: User is on the registration page
test_steps: Enter invalid email format and weak password.
test_cases.expected_results: Error messages are displayed for invalid email and password.

test_cases.title: Access Login Page from Homepage
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can access the login page from the homepage.
test_cases.expected_results: Login page is displayed.

test_cases.title: Successful User Login
test_cases.description: Verify that a registered user can log in with correct credentials.
preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_results: User is redirected to the dashboard.

test_cases.title: Login with Incorrect Credentials
test_cases.description: Verify that error messages are displayed for incorrect login credentials.
preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_results: Error message is displayed for incorrect credentials.

test_cases.title: Password Reset Link Request
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can request a password reset link from the login page.
preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_results: Password reset link is sent to the user's email.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with New Password
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can reset their password using the reset link.
preconditions: User has received password reset email
test_steps: Click on the password reset link in the email.
test_cases.expected_results: Password is reset successfully and user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Previously Used Password
test_cases.description: Verify that user cannot reuse previous passwords during password reset.
preconditions: User has received password reset email
test_steps: Click on the password reset link.
test_cases.expected_results: Error message is displayed indicating password reuse is not allowed.

test_cases.title: View Profile Information
test_cases.description: Verify that a logged-in user can view their profile information from the dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: Profile information is displayed.

test_cases.title: Edit Profile with Valid Details
test_cases.description: Verify that user can edit their profile with valid details.
test_cases.expected_results: Profile is updated and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Edit Profile with Already Used Email
test_cases.description: Verify that user cannot change their email to one already in use.
preconditions: Another user exists with the target email
test_steps: Change email to one already registered.
test_cases.expected_results: Error message is displayed indicating email is already in use.

test_cases.title: Edit Profile with Invalid Input
test_cases.description: Verify that error messages are displayed for invalid profile input.
test_steps: Enter invalid email format and empty name.
test_cases.expected_results: Error messages are displayed for invalid input.

test_cases.title: Redirect to Dashboard After Login
test_cases.description: Verify that user is redirected to dashboard after successful login.
test_cases.expected_results: User is redirected to dashboard.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Displays User Name and Profile Picture
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard displays user's name and profile picture.
test_steps: Observe displayed name and profile picture.
test_cases.expected_results: User's name and profile picture are displayed on dashboard.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Shows Recent Activity and Notifications
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard shows user's recent activity and notifications.
preconditions: User has recent activity and notifications
test_steps: Check recent activity and notifications section.
test_cases.expected_results: Recent activity and notifications are displayed.

test_cases.title: Access Search Bar from All Pages
test_cases.description: Verify that user can access the search bar from all pages.
preconditions: User is logged in or not
test_steps: Navigate to homepage, dashboard, item listing, and profile page.
Check for presence of search bar on each page.
test_cases.expected_results: Search bar is accessible from all pages.

test_cases.title: Search with Valid Keyword
test_cases.description: Verify that user can search for items using valid keywords.
test_steps: Enter a valid keyword in the search bar.
test_cases.expected_results: Relevant items are displayed in search results.

test_cases.title: Search Results Update Dynamically
test_cases.description: Verify that search results update dynamically as user types.
test_steps: Start typing a keyword in the search bar.
Observe search results as each character is entered.
test_cases.expected_results: Search results update dynamically with each keystroke.

test_cases.title: Filter Search Results by Category
test_cases.description: Verify that user can filter search results by category.
test_steps: Select a category filter from search results page.
test_cases.expected_results: Search results are filtered by selected category.

test_cases.title: Access Item Listing Page from Dashboard
test_cases.description: Verify that user can access item listing page from dashboard.
test_steps: Click on 'Items' or 'Browse Items' from dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: Item listing page is displayed.

test_cases.title: Item Listing Displays Images, Titles, and Descriptions
test_cases.description: Verify that item listing displays images, titles, and short descriptions for each item.
preconditions: User is on item listing page
test_steps: Check for image, title, and description for each item.
test_cases.expected_results: Each item displays image, title, and short description.

test_cases.title: Sort Items by Date
test_cases.description: Verify that user can sort items by date.
preconditions: User is on item listing page
test_cases.expected_results: Items are sorted by date.

test_cases.title: Paginate Through Item Listings
test_cases.description: Verify that user can paginate through item listings.
preconditions: User is on item listing page
test_cases.expected_results: User can view items on subsequent pages.

test_cases.title: View Total Number of Items Available
test_cases.description: Verify that user can see the total number of items available.
preconditions: User is on item listing page
test_steps: Observe the total item count displayed.
test_cases.expected_results: Total number of items is displayed.

test_cases.title: View Item Details by Clicking Item
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view item details by clicking on an item.
preconditions: User is on item listing page
test_steps: Click on an item from the listing.
test_cases.expected_results: Item details page is displayed.

test_cases.title: Item Details Display Full Description and Images
test_cases.description: Verify that item details page displays full description, images, and related information.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_steps: Check for full description, images, and related info.
test_cases.expected_results: Full description, images, and related information are displayed.

test_cases.title: View Reviews and Ratings for Item
test_cases.description: Verify that user can see reviews and ratings for the item.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_cases.expected_results: Reviews and ratings are displayed for the item.

test_cases.title: Add Item to Favorites from Details Page
test_cases.description: Verify that user can add an item to favorites from the item details page.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_cases.expected_results: Item is added to favorites and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: View and Manage Favorites from Dashboard
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view and manage favorites from dashboard.
test_steps: View and remove items from favorites.
test_cases.expected_results: Favorites are displayed and user can remove items.

test_cases.title: Favorites List Updates in Real Time
test_cases.description: Verify that favorites list updates in real time when items are added or removed.
test_steps: Add or remove item from favorites.
test_cases.expected_results: Favorites list updates immediately.

test_cases.title: Submit Review from Item Details Page
test_cases.description: Verify that user can submit a review from item details page.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_steps: Enter review text and select star rating.
test_cases.expected_results: Review is submitted and displayed.

test_cases.title: Edit Submitted Review
test_cases.description: Verify that user can edit their submitted review.
test_cases.expected_results: Review is updated and changes are displayed.

test_cases.title: Delete Submitted Review
test_cases.description: Verify that user can delete their submitted review.
test_cases.expected_results: Review is deleted and removed from display.

test_cases.title: Prevent Multiple Reviews for Same Item
test_cases.description: Verify that user cannot submit multiple reviews for the same item.
preconditions: User has already submitted a review for item
test_steps: Attempt to submit another review for the same item.
test_cases.expected_results: Error message is displayed preventing multiple reviews.

test_cases.title: Access Notifications from Dashboard
test_cases.description: Verify that user can access notifications from dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: Notifications are displayed.

test_cases.title: Mark Notifications as Read
test_cases.description: Verify that user can mark notifications as read.
test_steps: Mark one or more notifications as read.
test_cases.expected_results: Notifications are marked as read and highlighted status is removed.

test_cases.title: Notifications Update in Real Time
test_cases.description: Verify that notifications update in real time.
test_steps: Trigger a new notification (e.g., receive message).
test_cases.expected_results: New notification appears immediately.

test_cases.title: Admin View All Registered Users
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can view a list of all registered users.
test_cases.expected_results: All registered users are listed.

test_cases.title: Admin Search and Filter Users
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can search and filter users by name or email.
test_steps: Enter name or email in search/filter field.
test_cases.expected_results: User list is filtered according to search criteria.

test_cases.title: Admin Deactivate User Account
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can deactivate a user account.
test_steps: Select a user from the list.
test_cases.expected_results: User account is deactivated and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin Cannot Delete Own Account
test_cases.description: Verify that admin cannot delete their own account.
test_steps: Attempt to delete own admin account.
test_cases.expected_results: Action is prevented and error message is displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin Add New Item
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can add new items with all required details.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is added and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin Edit Existing Item
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can edit existing item information.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is updated and changes are reflected immediately.

test_cases.title: Admin Remove Item from Listing
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can remove items from the listing.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is removed and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin View All Submitted Reviews
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can view all submitted reviews.
test_cases.expected_results: All submitted reviews are displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin Delete Inappropriate Review
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can delete or hide inappropriate reviews.
test_cases.expected_results: Review is removed from public view and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin Filter Reviews by Item
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can filter reviews by item.
test_steps: Select item filter in reviews section.
test_cases.expected_results: Reviews are filtered by selected item.

test_cases.title: User Logout from Dashboard
test_cases.description: Verify that user can log out from dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: User is logged out, session terminated, and redirected to homepage.

test_cases.title: Prevent Dashboard Access After Logout
test_cases.description: Verify that user cannot access dashboard after logging out.
test_steps: Attempt to access dashboard URL directly.
test_cases.expected_results: Access is denied and user is redirected to login or homepage.

test_cases.title: Change Password with Current Password
test_cases.description: Verify that user can change password by entering current password.
test_steps: Enter current password and new password.
test_cases.expected_results: Password is changed and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Change Password with Invalid Input
test_cases.description: Verify that error messages are displayed for invalid password input.
test_steps: Enter incorrect current password or weak new password.
test_cases.expected_results: Error messages are displayed for invalid input.

test_cases.title: Prevent Password Reuse on Change
test_cases.description: Verify that user cannot reuse previous passwords when changing password.
test_steps: Enter current password and previously used password as new password.
test_cases.expected_results: Error message is displayed preventing password reuse.

test_cases.title: Access Favorites List from Dashboard
test_cases.description: Verify that user can access favorites list from dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: Favorites list is displayed.

test_cases.title: Remove Item from Favorites List
test_cases.description: Verify that user can remove items from favorites list.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is removed and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Favorites List Updates in Real Time After Removal
test_cases.description: Verify that favorites list updates in real time after item removal.
test_cases.expected_results: Favorites list updates immediately and item is removed.

test_cases.title: Filter Items by Category
test_cases.description: Verify that user can filter items by category.
preconditions: User is on item listing page
test_cases.expected_results: Items are filtered by selected category.

test_cases.title: Clear Applied Filters
test_cases.description: Verify that user can clear filters to view all items.
preconditions: User has applied filters on item listing page
test_cases.expected_results: All items are displayed after clearing filters.

test_cases.title: Filter Items by Price and Rating
test_cases.description: Verify that user can filter items by price and rating.
preconditions: User is on item listing page
Items have price and rating attributes
test_cases.expected_results: Items are filtered by selected price and rating.

test_cases.title: Share Item Details to Facebook
test_cases.description: Verify that user can share item details to Facebook.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_cases.expected_results: Item details are shared to Facebook and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Share Item Details to Twitter
test_cases.description: Verify that user can share item details to Twitter.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_cases.expected_results: Item details are shared to Twitter and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Copy Item Link to Clipboard
test_cases.description: Verify that user can copy item link to clipboard.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_cases.expected_results: Item link is copied to clipboard and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Shared Content Includes Item Image and Description
test_cases.description: Verify that shared content includes item image and description.
test_steps: Share item details via social media.
test_cases.expected_results: Shared content includes item image and description.

test_cases.title: View All Reviews for Item
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view all reviews for an item on item details page.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_cases.expected_results: All reviews for the item are displayed.

test_cases.title: Reviews Display Reviewer Name, Rating, and Comments
test_cases.description: Verify that reviews display reviewer name, rating, and comments.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_steps: Check for reviewer name, rating, and comments.
test_cases.expected_results: Reviewer name, rating, and comments are displayed for each review.

test_cases.title: Reviews Sorted by Date
test_cases.description: Verify that reviews are sorted by date.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_steps: Select 'Sort by Date' option in reviews section.
test_cases.expected_results: Reviews are sorted by date.

test_cases.title: Report Inappropriate Review
test_cases.description: Verify that user can report inappropriate reviews.
test_cases.expected_results: Review is reported and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Review Count Displayed on Item Details Page
test_cases.description: Verify that review count is displayed on item details page.
preconditions: User is on item details page
test_steps: Observe review count near reviews section.
test_cases.expected_results: Total review count is displayed.

summary: 69 comprehensive test cases have been generated covering all user stories and requirements. Each user story is covered with positive, negative, boundary, and edge case scenarios ensuring thorough functional test coverage for registration, authentication, profile management, dashboard, item browsing, search, favorites, reviews, notifications, admin management, and sharing functionalities.
